BIO

Introduction

I am a college graduate at Medgar Ever College with a degree in Computer Information System I am also part of the Honor Society I am currently taking a Front end bootcamp. I have experience with front End and back End coding. When am not building projects I tend to practice coding with on Codeacadmy and CodePen. You can check out some of my projects and I am looking forward to connecting with you.
